Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?

I have enlarging blood vessels on my tongue, red spots and bumps on my tongue, inside of my mouth, nose, lower lip, and fingertips. I also experience frequent nosebleeds and have iron-deficiency anemia that doesn’t get better with iron supplements.
Have you had any gastrointestinal issues or blood in the stool?
No, I haven't mentioned any gastrointestinal issues or blood in the stool.
Do you have a family history of similar symptoms?
Yes, my father had similar symptoms and he passed away at the age of 50.
Final Diagnosis: Hereditary Hemorrhagic Telangiectasia
